title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.21 - Laundry washing machines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.21 - Laundry washing machines

State Regulations

After March 1, 1967 a washing machine of the front-loading
type which has its loading port door at such a location that hot water may be
discharged if the door is opened shall be provided with a device to prevent
opening of the door unless the water level is below the bottom of the
port. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
